title: finally got my hands on a new 3ds XL
body:
Upgrading from a 2ds to a new 3ds XL feels awesome, now Monster hunter 4 ultimate feels more playable and getting a chance to play megaman X on the go is also going to be great.

I even got my hands on a copy of pokemon X to go along with it and I am having a good time so far, can't wait to pick up pokemon sun when it comes out.
